about.introduction: Born in Kochi and now riding the creative streets of Bangalore, I treat every project like a fresh run full of momentum, precision, and a willingness to take risks.
experienceHighlights: I've ollied over tight deadlines, slid through complex brand challenges, and landed creative tricks for brands like Intel, Wipro, Infosys, AWS, Jabra, and Acer - and plenty more on my ride map.
about.creativePhilosophy: My work blends bold storytelling with design impact, whether it's a high-voltage campaign, a brand identity with bite, or a layout built to turn heads. Every brief is a new drop-in, and I'm always ready to ride it to the perfect landing.

details.overview: A corporate gaming platform was developed to reduce employee stress, enhance productivity, and foster stronger team bonding through fun, interactive gameplay tailored for in-house use.
details.designThinking: We chose a vibrant and energetic visual language to reflect the playful spirit of the platform, using bold colors and dynamic forms to spark excitement and collaboration. The branding and posters were crafted to be both fun and professional-resonating with corporate audiences.
execution: Logo: Bold, dynamic typography with flames/icons
Posters: Teaser & engagement posters for office display
Website: Clean, responsive web experience with game previews
Video: High-energy promo video for onboarding & awareness
details.lookingAhead: Fostering team spirit and reducing workplace stress, this project can be introduced to more corporate offices and adapted for hybrid teams. Play is a powerful way to strengthen connections, inspire collaboration, and transform workplace culture.

details.overview: A cross-platform app (mobile, tablet, laptop) that uses smartwatch health data to suggest meals tailored to real-time body needs, with healthy drink pairings and lifestyle tips.
details.challenge: People often eat based on habit, convenience, or social influence rather than actual body needs. There is a lack of real-time, personalized nutrition guidance.
details.solution: An AI-powered app that connects with wearables to analyze body condition and suggest personalized meals and healthy drink pairings instantly.
details.impact: Encourages healthier eating habits, reduces overconsumption, and bridges the gap between health tracking and actionable nutrition.
